content.question: Nominal gross domestic product is best defined as

choices.label: the market value of all goods and services consumed in a nation in a given year
the market value of final goods and services produced in a nation in a given year
the base-year value of total goods and services produced in a nation in a given year
the base-year value of final goods and services produced in a nation in a given year
the market value of all goods and services produced and consumed in a nation in a given year

content.answer: the market value of final goods and services produced in a nation in a given year

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
